subject: CALBEAF-70: Return granted/alternate events for RegionalOrganizer
body:
Fulton, new ticket for you. CALBEAF-70.

El Gotan found that RegionalOrganizers can only edit events they OWN, not events they've been GRANTED (alternateOrganizer). The FE fix is TIEMPO-348, but it depends on AF returning those events.

What's needed from AF:
1. GET /api/events for an RO should also return events where the RO's organizerId appears in grantedOrganizerID, alternateOrganizerID, or alternateOrganizers[].id
2. PUT endpoints should allow edits by alternateOrganizers, not just ownerOrganizer
3. Handle both OLD schema (ownerOrganizerID/grantedOrganizerID/alternateOrganizerID) and NEW schema (ownerOrganizer.id + alternateOrganizers[].id)

Also: your 3 pending organizer questions (eventRole enum, empty array, validation) are relevant here. El Gotan hasn't answered them yet but this ticket gives context.

Separately: SystemAdmin needs unrestricted edit access. That's FE-only (TIEMPO-348), no AF change needed — the SA already sees all events.

— Sarah
